overview: Paul West is a Zimbabwean national with over 12 years experience working within multinational corporations across Africa. After completing his schooling in Zimbabwe, he graduated from the University of Cape Town and qualified as an accountant whilst at Ernst & Young. Most recently, Paul has worked as a Director of The African Lakes Corporation. He was part of a small team, which worked with UK-based investors raising the necessary funding to roll out a consumer broadband infrastructure in Kenya, Tanzania and Ghana, which was followed by the successful disposal of the business to Telkom South Africa.
